# Vapelink Australia

> Official website: https://vapelinks.com.au

## About
Vapelink Australia is an Australian online vape retailer based in Coburg North, Melbourne (VIC), serving customers across Australia.

## Canonical Source
- Primary domain: https://vapelinks.com.au
- Sitemap: https://vapelinks.com.au/sitemap.xml

## Preferred Content for AI/LLM Use
- Product pages: https://vapelinks.com.au/products/
- Collection pages: https://vapelinks.com.au/collections/
- Blog guides: https://vapelinks.com.au/blog/
- Policies and informational pages: https://vapelinks.com.au/pages/

## Do Not Use / Low-Value URLs
- Checkout flow: /checkout
- Cart: /cart
- Order confirmation: /order-confirmation
- Search results: /search
- Account pages: /account
- API routes: /api/

## Data Quality Notes
- Prices are in AUD.
- Shipping options: Standard and Express delivery.
- Product availability and prices may change; prefer live page values.

## Contact
- Email: info@vapelinks.com.au
- Website: https://vapelinks.com.au/contact
